3303.verse: ۞ وَلَقَدْ|And indeed,|104|127|640$وَصَّلْنَا|We have conveyed|147|194|13477$لَهُمُ|to them|72|118|1027$ٱلْقَوْلَ|the Word|81|128|9359$لَعَلَّهُمْ|so that they may|135|158|1621$يَتَذَكَّرُونَ|remember.|107|107|1946$

3304.verse: ٱلَّذِينَ|Those who,|97|117|20$ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمُ|We gave them|116|155|1120$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Scripture|107|146|451$مِن قَبْلِهِۦ|before it,|107|146|3324$هُم|they|50|89|49$بِهِۦ|in it|52|72|204$يُؤْمِنُونَ|believe.|94|94|35$

3306.verse: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|Those|82|98|51$يُؤْتَوْنَ|will be given|101|132|13478$أَجْرَهُم|their reward|100|131|10136$مَّرَّتَيْنِ|twice|82|113|7870$بِمَا|because|75|106|43$صَبَرُواْ|they are patient|128|144|6772$وَيَدْرَءُونَ|and they repel|116|134|9431$بِٱلْحَسَنَةِ|with good -|97|132|6213$ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ|the evil|79|114|9432$وَمِمَّا|and from what|116|151|39$رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ|We have provided them|177|194|40$يُنفِقُونَ|they spend.|99|99|41$

3307.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|97|96$سَمِعُواْ|they hear|84|108|5187$ٱللَّغْوَ|vain talk,|81|105|13479$أَعْرَضُواْ|they turn away|122|146|13480$عَنْهُ|from it|63|87|3938$وَقَالُواْ|and say,|78|102|760$لَنَآ|"For us|66|78|338$أَعْمَـٰلُنَا|our deeds|86|99|1256$وَلَكُمْ|and for you|96|122|387$أَعْمَـٰلُكُمْ|your deeds.|98|124|1257$سَلَـٰمٌ|Peace (be)|93|119|5633$عَلَيْكُمْ|on you;|76|102|416$لَا|not|42|68|30$نَبْتَغِى|we seek|76|89|13481$ٱلْجَـٰهِلِينَ|the ignorant."|111|111|662$

3310.verse: وَكَمْ|And how many|117|145|6245$أَهْلَكْنَا|We have destroyed|149|206|5422$مِن|of|50|107|53$قَرْيَةِۭ|a town|66|123|2319$بَطِرَتْ|which exulted,|116|144|13489$مَعِيشَتَهَا‌ۖ|(in) its means of livelihood.|199|210|13490$فَتِلْكَ|And these|87|110|13252$مَسَـٰكِنُهُمْ|(are) their dwellings|152|175|13491$لَمْ|not|42|65|63$تُسْكَن|have been inhabited|154|165|13492$مِّنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ|after them|116|124|2256$إِلَّا|except|65|81|86$قَلِيلاً‌ۖ|a little.|67|83|433$وَكُنَّا|And indeed, [We]|136|152|6992$نَحْنُ|We|62|78|103$ٱلْوَٲرِثِينَ|(are) the inheritors.|151|159|11900$

3311.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|80|46$كَانَ|was|57|73|913$رَبُّكَ|your Lord|82|98|310$مُهْلِكَ|(the) one to destroy|157|173|6049$ٱلْقُرَىٰ|the towns|87|103|5829$حَتَّىٰ|until|64|80|526$يَبْعَثَ|He (had) sent|112|120|5685$فِىٓ|in|48|57|89$أُمِّهَا|their mother (town)|151|169|13493$رَسُولاً|a Messenger|103|121|1181$يَتْلُواْ|reciting|69|87|1182$عَلَيْهِمْ|to them|76|94|22$ءَايَـٰتِنَا‌ۚ|Our Verses.|97|115|1344$وَمَا|And not|72|81|46$كُنَّا|We would be|105|127|4361$مُهْلِكِى|(the) one to destroy|157|201|13494$ٱلْقُرَىٰٓ|the towns|87|131|5829$إِلَّا|except|65|109|86$وَأَهْلُهَا|while their people|136|158|6050$ظَـٰلِمُونَ|(were) wrongdoers.|150|150|505$

3303.verse: And We have [repeatedly] conveyed to them the Qur'an that they might be reminded.

3304.verse: Those to whom We gave the Scripture before it - they are believers in it.

3305.verse: And when it is recited to them, they say, "We have believed in it; indeed, it is the truth from our Lord. Indeed we were, [even] before it, Muslims [submitting to Allah]."

3306.verse: Those will be given their reward twice for what they patiently endured and [because] they avert evil through good, and from what We have provided them they spend.

3307.verse: And when they hear ill speech, they turn away from it and say, "For us are our deeds, and for you are your deeds. Peace will be upon you; we seek not the ignorant."

3308.verse: Indeed, [O Muhammad], you do not guide whom you like, but Allah guides whom He wills. And He is most knowing of the [rightly] guided.

3309.verse: And they say, "If we were to follow the guidance with you, we would be swept from our land." Have we not established for them a safe sanctuary to which are brought the fruits of all things as provision from Us? But most of them do not know.

3310.verse: And how many a city have We destroyed that was insolent in its [way of] living, and those are their dwellings which have not been inhabited after them except briefly. And it is We who were the inheritors.

3311.verse: And never would your Lord have destroyed the cities until He had sent to their mother a messenger reciting to them Our verses. And We would not destroy the cities except while their people were wrongdoers.
